meanings.sent1: The caffeinic drink kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: I prefer caffeinic beverages in the morning to start my day.
meanings.sent3: The caffeinic coffee was so strong, it practically jumped out of the cup!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was as caffeinic as a double shot of espresso.
meanings.sent5: The caffeinic aroma of the coffee shop was inviting and energizing.

meanings.sent1: The caffeinic effects of the energy drink were noticeable right away.
meanings.sent2: His caffeinic behavior indicated he had consumed too much coffee.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics were as caffeinic as a kitten on catnip.
meanings.sent4: The caffeinic buzz in the room was palpable, like electricity in the air.
meanings.sent5: The caffeinic rush made her feel like she could conquer the world.
